projects.title: IoT Home Automation using Cloud Computing
projects.description: A web app for a cloud-based home automation system operable from 190 countries. Utilized Google Firebase, Arduino, Node MCU, and sensors for efficiency. Achieved 79% accuracy and 50% more efficiency than previous products.
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

projects.title: Supply Chain Tracking Project (Blockchain & .NET)
projects.description: A .NET-based blockchain supply chain system, utilizing decentralized architecture and smart contracts for transparency and data integrity. Integrated IoT devices for regulatory compliance, achieving a 30% boost in efficiency.
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

projects.title: Food Ordering and Fees Payment System for Colleges
projects.description: A comprehensive college application with features including an online notice board, canteen ordering, and fee payment system. Utilized Express JS, Node JS, and React JS, integrating payment APIs like PayPal and Google Pay for a comprehensive solution.
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

projects.title: Used and New Car Website for Askey Auto(FreeLancing)
projects.description: Developed a dynamic website for Askey Auto, facilitating the buying and selling of both new and used cars. The website incorporated modern web technologies, including Node.js, React.js, Firebase, HTML, and CSS, to ensure a seamless user experience.
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

projects.title: Medicare Shopping System - Flask
projects.description: Developed a Medicare Shopping System using Flask, HTML, and CSS to provide users with a seamless experience in browsing and selecting Medicare products like medicine. The system leveraged Flask's lightweight and efficient framework to handle user requests and responses.
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

projects.title: Uncovering the Factors that Drive Airbnb Bookings and Revenue
projects.description: A portfolio which analyze NYC Airbnb data, predicting bookings and revenue. Conducted demand, price, and geospatial analyses. Developed fraud detection algorithms. Grouped owners based on pet, smoking, and party policies
tags: Cloud, Android, Embedded, Arduino, nodejs, GCP, OAuth2

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
bulletPoints: Acquired expertise in web technologies including HTML, Angular, React, CSS, PHP, Webflow, JavaScript and Azure complemented by practical experience in using Adobe Creative Cloud software.

Collaborated closely with CEO and cross-functional team to spearhead design, development, and enhancement of ScholarshipAuditions.com, resulting in a significant increase in website traffic and a notable boost in user engagement throug optimized graphics and UI/UX improvements

experience.title: Embedded System Engineer Intern
bulletPoints: Pioneered a team of four in designing and implementing energy-efficient thermostat systems, consolidating Raspberry Pi 0 modules, fan chips, QT framework and various components to develop smart thermostat solutions

Optimized thermostat algorithms and hardware configurations, resulting in substantial energy savings and reduced utility costs for customers by 25% annually through optimized mobile app functionality.

experience.title: Web Developer
bulletPoints: Spearheaded development of a comprehensive website for healthcare professionals, leveraging JavaScript, Node.js, React, Django, and Spring Boot. Administered a robust and user-friendly interface to boost digital presence of doctors.

Engaged cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate technologies, yielding a dynamic website tailored to the specific needs of medical practitioners. Deployed advanced functionalities for streamlined appointments, patient information management, and enhanced communication channels utilizing a diverse tech stack.

experience.title: Web Designer
bulletPoints: Meet Various clients, understand their requirements, and then develop websites for them by using tools like Wix and godaddy for amplifying the looks of websites
Chaired and designed a new website for a doctor, while leading group of three and using React, JavaScript and angular at Bs Group internship

experience.title: Web Developer
bulletPoints: Increased contract tender data retrieval speed by 35% by developing an automated web scraping and PDF extraction pipeline. Streamlined the process with data preprocessing and cleaning, minimizing manual intervention and enhancing accuracy.

Boosted image data processing accuracy to 95% by designing and deploying deep learning models using Python integrated with JavaScript for seamless data flow, delivering high-precision image recognition capabilities for critical project requirements.

Improved web presence by developing and maintaining Exceller’s primary website using HTML, JavaScript, and Node.js, ensuring responsive design and optimized performance. Tracked and monitored e-commerce metrics, implementing updates that drove higher user engagement and conversion rates
Designing marketing posters and handling social media
